entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-03-22
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • CarouselView does not render correctly on orientation change #21401
  • Maui -Android certificate pinning is not kicking in.. but works in ios #21396
  • RelativeLayout renders blank with no visible elements #21395
    Backlog
  • [iOS] UIButton uses deprecated APIs when dealing with the Image #21394
    Backlog
  • NullReferenceException in Android TabbedPageManager #21393
  • IsPlatformEnabled is false for RoundRectangle stroke shape of a Border, hence the layouts that are part of the Microsoft.Maui.Controls.Compatibility and their derivateves are not rendered #21390
  • Memoryleak VisualstateManager in ButtonStyle on Android #21389
    Backlog
  • [Hybrid] Animation lag during 1st render fragment load #21388
  • DynamicResource does not pick up resources added to a page via MergedDictionaries #21387
  • [iOS] CollectionView has inconsistent width calculation between iOS and Android when in a Grid with 'auto' column definition #21385
  • InputTransparent has no effect on Windows #21384
  • CollectionView with ItemSpacing => Infinite layout loop Android #21379
    .NET 8 SR4

Closed

  • SecureStorage.Default.GetAsync not able to retrieve value set on another page. #21361
  • [Android] Exception after changing MainPage on App.xaml.cs from ContentPage to AppShell on runtime. #21257
  • [Android/iOS][NavigationPage] Inheritance of NavigationPage breaks TitleView #21327
  • VS2022 (v 17.9.3) will not hit breakpoints in a Task #21364
  • Maui-8.0.10-preview.10282 Fails AzureDevops looking for system runtime 9.00 #21096
  • MAUI Community Toolkit EventToCommandBehavior Fails to Pass EventArgs Arguments in Versions > 1.0 #21354
  • Keystroke capture support Maui #21397
  • [net9.0] Not able to load net9 branch on VS Internal preview can't build Maps on windows #20753
    .NET 9 Planning
  • Windows/UWP crashes on 8.0.10 #21360
  • Multi Project Template .Net8? #21391
  • Maui for ios RTL modes problem with ScrollView #17674
  • Border has an almost animated resizing effect when first loaded. (IOS) #21103
  • Bindings in a CollectionView are evaluated far too often #20797
  • Request for disambiguation of NativeReference and ObjCBindingLibrary #21352
  • Implement DependencyPropertyHelper.GetValueSource just like in WPF #17223
    .NET 8 SR4

PullRequests

Created

  • Revert "[iOS] Clear BindingContext when cell is queued for reuse (#14… #21400
  • [net9.0] Merge main to net9 #21392
    t/housekeeping ♻︎

Merged

  • Update BlazorWebView Device Tests to have longer timesouts and more retries #21318
    area/blazor 🕸️
  • Change activity attributes #20653
    platform/android 🤖, .NET 8 SR4
  • Removed vestigial UpdateContentLayout() method left over from Forms #18856
    area/layout 🔲, platform/android 🤖, stale, .NET 8 SR3
  • Make PopLifeCycle more reliable #21380
  • Update Styles.xaml on Multi Project #21363
  • [X] GetValueSource #19563
    area/testing, .NET 8 SR4

Updated

  • [Android] Ecosystem updates WAS:Google Maps bump/update #20783
    platform/android 🤖, area/Maps🗺
  • Fix display of ActionSheet in modal view on Windows #21295
    platform/windows 🪟, area/controls 🎮, control-dialogalert
  • [Android] Fix Ripple effect with custom background (alternative to #17821) #20412
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/drawing ✏️, area/controls 🎮, control-button
  • [Android] Fixed box view properties #21322
    t/bug, area/controls 🎮, community ✨
  • [controls] improve perf of "merged" ResourceDictionary lookups #21334
    area/perf 🏎️
  • [iOS] Use updated APIs for the button with images #20953
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-button
  • Add Apple Privacy Manifest to new project template #21350
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/templates 📄
  • [macOS] Make window overlay to redraw correctly during window resizing #21371
    community ✨
  • [Testing] Add legacy CollectionView UITests #18979
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/collectionview 📃, area/testing, stale, testing-legacy-ui-tests
  • [Trimming] Enable trimming and AOT analyzers in Core #21076
    area/app-size 🤏
  • [XamlC] Avoid calling ResourceDictionary.SetAndLoadSource #20776
    area/Xaml </>
  • [net9.0] [testing] Enable Windows UITests back #20727
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Fixed entry text color [iOS] #20100
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, community ✨, control-entry
  • [macOS] Fix crash when setting window properties #21357
    platform/macOS 🍏, community ✨, control-window
  • [Testing] Rework Appium Runner so that it goes directly to tests instead of navigates #20700
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #21092
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, do-not-merge, area/infrastructure 🏗️
